= Introduction =

easily changed via config.properties file in server.core package, the constants class offers an easy way to change settings without hard-coding it in the classes.


= Details =

 *POP_WINDOW=true -> indicates GUI is activated for server
 *DEFAULT_Global_Library_Path=library from which files will be uploaded
 *YEARLY_AMMOUNT,MONTHLY_AMMOUNT= ammounts gained by purhcasing a subscription
 *DEFAULTHOST="jdbc:mysql://localhost/cslabdnyy" -> DB address and scheme
 *DEFAULTUSER= DB user
 *DEFAULTPASS= password
 *DEFAULT_PORT= listening port for clients
 *POPULARITY_RATIO= howh much views weigh against purchases
 *DEBUG - if true then it disables the logging to files.
